name: Deep Dive (Ripe_Jalapeno)
description:
Controls : WASD to move, shift to jump (Carl only), and Tab to switch characters (use Tab to mount Leroy when close by)

This is our team's first collective game design project, and we have made it to submit for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Take control of Leroy the Eel and Carl the shrimp while enjoying Deep Dive's original soundtrack.
